Text: I think the movie makers dont know that UFO stands for Unidentified Flying Object.  Of course UFOs are real but just because something is unidentified doesnt mean its an alien lol.  I love this sort of dumb ass bullshit, thanks.

@lapis22
Your comment makes sense in a way, but dismisses the fact that for the most part of the 20th and 21st century the term UFO has mostly been associated with extraterrestrials. Obviously that a UFO isn't necessarily alien. That being said, if you see a UFO who's to say it is not alien? But yeah, when taking it literally "UFOs are real" is as stupid as saying "The solar system is real". As a side note, the original title for this documentary, when it was launched, was "Flying Saucers Are Real". Must have been a marketing decision to re-brand the title like this.
